title: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev Makes Court Appearance In Pretrial Hearing
teaser: Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev appeared in court on Thursday, marking his first time before the public in 17 months. The pretrial hearing comes ahead of a Jan. 5 trial.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
